pageContext.claim: “The problem you have is Nancy Pelosi. She couldn't care less about the worker, she couldn't care less about our people, and we should have a stimulus. And I want a stimulus, the Republicans will approve a stimulus. The problem is, she doesn't want to do it because she thinks it's bad for her election.”
pageContext.analysis: Democrats had passed a massive stimulus bill in May which the Senate refused to take up, preferring a smaller package. Yet Trump puts the blame on Pelosi, falsely claiming she is holding up a deal for election purposes.
